game.title: The Missing Prince
game.objective: Find the missing prince who vanished from his castle.
game.description: Prince Edric of Highgarden vanished without a trace from his castle overnight. His family is distraught, and rumors circulate about an unknown villain's plot or a supernatural curse. Uncover the truth and restore the prince to safety.
game.reward: A rare relic of the ancient kingdom, a token of the royal family's gratitude, and 1000 gold coins.
game.quest-giver: Lord Edgar Harroway, Castellan of Highgarden

task.objective: Gather testimonies from castle servants and guards.
task.description: Investigate the castle's staff and security to uncover any unusual activity or clues that may have contributed to the prince's disappearance. Search Prince Edric's chambers for further insights.

task.objective: 探查附近的村庄以获取线索。
task.description: Visit Oakbridge Town's taverns and markets to listen for gossip or leads about the prince. Talk to travelers and merchants who frequent Highgarden.
task.location: Oakbridge Town, The Rusty Tankard Inn

task.description: Explore the old mine; it's said to have a hidden passage. Be cautious as you search for any signs of the prince or potential threats.

task.objective: 面对嫌疑人或营救被俘的王子。
task.description: Depending on your findings, confront the suspected villain or devise a plan to rescue the prince if he is in their hands. Be prepared for any situation.
task.location: 废弃望塔，潜伏地点（具体情况未明）
